val:
Notation

  • Matrix M
  • Matrix N
  • Output Matrix P
  • row counter: i
  • column counter: j
  • P(i, j) is the element at Row-th position in the vertical direction and Col-th position in the horizontal direction

As shown in the picture below, PRow,Col (the small square in P) is the inner product of the vector formed from the Rowth row of M (shown as a horizontal strip in M) and the vector formed from the Colth column of N (shown as a vertical strip in N).
